div.p: Curia gilde tenta in per Johannem vaus prepositum septimo die mensis maij Anno supradicto

Quo die henricus prat per confessionem propriam conuictus fuit de forisstallacione pellium
et de Regratacione in patria paruorum denariatorum et quitus de forisstallacione lane et
coriorum

Thomas Alexanderson' per confessionem propriam conuictus fuit de forisstallacione pellium et de
Regratacione vt supra / et quitus de lana et coriorum

The xiij dai of the moneth' of Maij forsaid / It was ordanit and statute be the
Counsaile and diuers' of the gilde / for gude of merchandice / that naman sal by
woll derrar' than iiij s' the stane / at the maste / And quh of except the woll that
growis in marr' / for the quhilke thai sal noght' exceide v s' And quhasa
dois in the contrair' sal pay vnforgiffin to the commoune profite of this ton'
for ilke tyme that he trespass' xl s'

Alsua the aldirman and the counsaile has chargit thom newman and James
Elge of Dundee that / thai by na merchandice sic as woll hide and skin within
this fredome vndir the payne of eschete of the gude / And give ony free men
of this ton' sellis to thaim or ony othir men of Dundee or of perth' / ony sic
merchandice / h thai sal pay xl s' vnforgiffin to the commoune profite of this
ton' et cetera

In profesto Natiuitatis gloriose' virginis marie Anno Domini et cetera xlvto Elisabeth Scheves
sponsa patricij gray de consensu pariter et assensu eiusdem patricij necnon Andree gray
filij et apparentis heredis eorundem non vi aut metu ducta nec errore lapsa vt asseruit
sed mera et spontanea voluntate sua sursum reddidit pureque et simpliciter resignavit
in manibus Thome blyndseil tunc vnius balliuorum dicti burgi totam illam terram suam
Jacentem infra dictum burgum in ly chekkar' raw inter terram Johannis vaus ex parte australi
ex vna et terram quam tenet Johannes culane ex parte boreali partibus ex altera
ad dandum saisinam et possessionem hereditarias eiusdem Johanni bertlotson'
secundum tenorem et effectum carte sue quam inde habet et cetera Jurauit que
propterea dicta Elisabeth' se nuncquam contra huiusmodi Resignacionem venire aut in preiudicium
dicti Johannis bertlotson' alligare clam vel palam / et super hoc dictus Johannes bertlotson'
pecijt a me notario publico instrumentum / testibus Johanne de fife Johanne voket filio
Willelmo Wodman et Dauid Dun . cum alijs / datum in pretorio

Parua custuma nauium assedatur Johanni vaus pro vii vj lib' xiij s' iiij d' annuatim ad
terminum quinque annorum a festo beati martinj Anni Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo
quarto / complendorum testibus Johanne de scrogs patre Johanne de marr' patricio badenach'

Schethokisley assedatur Johanni de scrogs filio ad terminum quinque annorum vt supra quolibet
anno pro iij lib' vj s' viij d' annuatim et cetera

head.foreign: acta die veneris primo die octobris Anno Domini et cetera xlvto

div.p:
Thir' personnes vndirwrittin consentis auisitli and for gude caus' that the chesing
of officiaris of this burgh' the quhilk suld be on monounday next tocum that
is to say the feird dai of this instant moneth' of october / be continowit
quhil it be newlingis warnyt be the officiaris or be the bell

Curia gilde huius burgi tenta per Johannem vaus prepositum eiusdem octauo die mensis octobris
Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo quinto

Quo die per confratres gilde subscripti electi fuerunt in Communes Consiliarios huius
Burgi pro vno anno proximo futuro
Alexander de Camera

Vicesimosecundo die mensis octobris Anno Domini supradicto / Maior pars tocius gilde congregata
in pretorio huius burgi confratres gilde tunc presentes singillatim interrogati vtrum
vellent habere aliquem dominum Capitaneum huius burgi Responderunt omnes et dixerunt
quod nullum vellent habere Capitaneum preter dominum Regem prepositum et officiales
burgi

Tercio die mensis Decembris Anno Domini supradicto / Betuex Mergare the spousse
vmquhile of Williame pulty with' consent of Dauid Dvn hir spous' on that
a part and Androu pulty Eeme and tutor lachful' to matheu son' and air'
to the said vmquhile Williame pulty on that othir' part / considering the
Right' that forsaid mergarete in to the land the quhilk Williame pulty
duelt in / it was appoyntit and accordit betuex the said partiez with'
consent of thaim bath' in maner and fourme as eftir folowis / that is to say
that the said matheu son' to the said vmquhile Williame and mergarete
salbe kend be the balyheis and put in possessioune of the fee of the said
land / And the forsaid mergarete sal bruke and Jois' the franktenement
of the said land for al the daijs of hir live / And scho sal fynd the barne
as hir' son' forsaid / as afferis on to the tyme that he cum to age that he
may travaile and govern him self / And fra thyne furth' that he make
hir ma na coste scho sal pay him yherli' owte of the said land xv s'
and scho sal vphald the land sufficientli Reparalit et cetera

Item the sammyn dai in continent John' gray ane of the balyheis of this
burgh' tuke diuers' worthi men of the toune in witnes and passit to
the said land and kennyt the forsaid matheu pulty as air' and son' to
the forsaid vmquhile Williame / to the fee of the said land in the
quhilk the forsaid vmquhile Williame his fadir duelt / with' the pertenance
as law and custume of burgh' is

p.hi:
Burgenses et confratres gilde factj'j' overwrites 'e'. et Recepti in secundo anno prepositure
Johannis Vaus supradictj et cetera

div.p:
Walterus de ogilvy sl ex consideracione consilij Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et confratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento et cetera

Willelmus cummyne filius Jacobi cummyne ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento

Johannes rollande ex consideracione consilii Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento et cetera ac eciam pro matrimonio contracto inter ipsum Johannem
et filiam Willelmi Westlande et cetera

Willelmus symsone ex Consideracione Consilii Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi pro matrimonio contracto inter ipsum Willelmum et filiam Johannis gray plegius Johannes
gray pro x lib'

Johannes de park qui contraxit matrimonium cum filia Johannis henrison' senioris confratris
gilde rece ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit pro v s'

Andreas scherar qui contraxit matrimonium cum consanguinea magistri henrici hervy
confratris gilde ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit pro iiij lib' ple prestito
solito Juramento / Illis adiectis condicionibus quod si quacumque de causa dimittat
vel celebrari faciat seu contingat diuorcium inter ipsum et dictam sponsam
suam vel transportet an lanam pelles vel correa vltra montes aut
foristallet soluet communitatj huius burgi x lib' et amittet priuilegium huius burgi
plegiis pro dicto forisfacto / et vicinitate Johanne scherar' de Deer et Johanne heruy

Walterus piot qui disponsav'v' overwrites 'b'.it disponsauit filiam Johannis voket patris ex consideracione
consilij receptus fuit pro v s' prestito solito Juramento plegio
Gilbertus vaus receptus fuit racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
Patricius de fife racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Henricus de levington' ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit pro xl s'

Johannes de buchane scissor qui ab antea factus fuit burgensis ex consideracione
consilij receptus fuit in confratrem gilde pro xx s' plegio
Willelmus de stradee racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'

p.del: Quo die Johannes Thomsone ex consideracione consilii Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem pro xviii s' ad instanciam Stephani Johannis et cetera

div.p:
Thomas malisone ex consideracione consilii ad instanciam Alexandri de Irwyne' Receptus
fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde et cetera
Thomas croudane racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s' plegio
Johannes gray filius Johannis gray racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Andreas patrikson' racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Johannes henrison' filius Johannis henrison' Junioris receptus fuit pro v s'
Willelmus Wyndsor' racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
- Johannes tode receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde pro tribus libris
Malcolmus de forbas receptus fuit racione paterne libertatis v s'
henricius gwrlay receptus fuit racione wxoris sue v s'
- Johannes Joffraison' Receptus fuit in burgensem et confratrem gilde pro xl s' plegio Johanne voket
Johannes Wright' filius Andree Wright' racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'

- Johannes fauside qui antea fuit burgensis / nunc ob fauorem Johannis benyng confratris gilde
cuius filiam disponsauit receptus fuit ex consideracione fauorabili consilij

- Robertus lorymar' ex consideracione consilij ex eo quod disponsauit filiam vnius confratris
gile gilde Receptus fuit pro xx in fraternitatem gilde pro xx s' quia alias eciam fuit
factus burgensis et scribitur infra in proximo folio

- Willelmus de lowask textor receptus fuit in burgensem et confratrem gilde pro
liij s' iiij d' prestito solito Juramento plegio pro eo Dauid symson'

Thomas lawson' ad instanciam Ricardi Kintor receptus fuit ex eo quod fuit eidem per
commune consilium concessus nuper quando fuit abbas de boneacord / pro expensis suis
factis in quodam ludo de ly haliblude luso apud ly Wyndmylhill / et prestitit
solitum Juramentum plegio pro eo eodem Ricardo Kintor

Ricardus de hill ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit pro v s' ex eo quod disponsabit
filiam Johannis de marr' senioris quod si non impleuerit satisfaciett communitati x lib'
plegiis Johanne de marr' Juniore et Roberto blyndseil

Donaldus de fife filius quondam Duncani de fife confratris gilde rece racione paterne libertatis
receptus fuit pro v s' plegio pro eo Johanne de fife

Andreas filius alexandri pistor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum prestito solito Juramento
et soluit xviij s' plegio pro eo

Johannes thomson' ad instanciam Stephani Johnson' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
tantum / pro xviij s' prestito solito Juramento plegio

Johannes filius Willelmi textor receptus est in liberum burgensem
tantum pro xx s'
Robertus lorymar' Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem pro xx s' plegio
Hugo Johnson' carnifex Receptus fuit in burgensem pro xx s' plegio pro eo

Dauid clerk Junior ex consideracione consilij receptus fuit ex eo quod disponsabit filiam
thome henrison' comburgensis et prestitit solitum Juramentum plegio pro eo Dauid clerk seniore

The xiij dai of october the yher' of grace forsaid / Androw Alaneson' on that
a part and Robert blyndseil on that othir' part apon the action of iniuris
movit before the bischop of abirdene be the said Androw agaynis the said
Robert / and apon al othir' actiones and clames the quhilkis ar vn endit
of befor that the said Robert may put to the said Androu / thai ar
summyttit til thir' persounes vndirwrittin / that is to say maistir Jamys
Stewart maistir henry hervy maistir Idil maistir Duncane of lichton' and
and maistir Walter foularton' chanonnes of abirdon and John' the vaus
gilbert meignes John' of marr' and alexander of Kintor burgez of abirdene
the quhilkis sal be sworn to end the said matir as law and gude
consciens will / and the said partijs ar oblist to vndirly thair'
determinacion be the faithes of thair' bodijs /

Eodem die Robertus blyndseil dedit Johannem voket plegium legalem quod dictus Andreas
erit indempnis pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et similiter idem Andreas dedit Johannem de marr' plegium legalem quod dictus Robertus
et pars sua erunt indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Decimoseptimo die mensis Decembris Anno Domini Mmo CCCCmo xlvto Willelmus fichet
filius et heres quondam Ricardi fichet Resignauit in manibus Johannis gray vnius balliuorum
huius burgi illam terram suam Jacentem in vico inferiori ecclesie ex parte australi eiusdem
inter terram alexandri de camera ex parte orientali ex vna et terram eiusdem q Johannis
de scrogs patris ex parte occidentali partibus ex altera / ad dandum saisinam hereditariam
eidem Johanni de scrogs de predicta terra cum partis ad feodofirmam reddendo inde
sibi annuatim xiij s' iiij d' / teste curia

the achtandtwenty day of the moneth of Januarij
the yer' of our lord et cetera fowrty f and fywe in
presens of the aldirman' and in the gild cwrt the ballyes
set the rwde mallis of the town' and of rwbbislaw
tyll' Alexander androwson' and to John' of spens' for the
term of fywe yer' for vj lib' yerly entirand in
the said tak at the martymess' befor' this dat
abeowyn wirtyn borch for the said alexander John of
scrogis and for the said John of spens John of mar
of the castall' gat

The xviii day of the moneth of februar' the yher' of grace et cetera xlvto Jhone' of
Scrogs and Johne' gray twa of the ballieis of the burgh of Aberdene' And gilbert
meignes vndir awmerale in the name of the tovne' has resauit in to saufgarde and vndir
thar licence Williame Roger yhong Inglisman and his childer because of scortnes of his
condit for the tyme that he bydis or makis residens in the havynnis of Scotlande
and this throw vertu of his the trewis bath schip and gude

Apone the debat movit betwix Robert blindsele Robert of Chamer and Williame of Cadiou anent
the feyng of iii mene apone' a net It is ordande be the consale with the consent of thaim self that Jhone'
Somer suld remayne stil at the wattir / And the tothir twa men to p be put away And a nothir man tobe feyit
to Jhone' Somer with the consent of thaim all thre And gif thai wil nocht Swa lat ilkeman fynd a man
and ilkane helpe othir / her atour it is acordit be thaim selvyne that mcrow and bannerman be bath put
away And a sufficient man chosin be the consent of the hale cavile

Anent the action betwen' John' of sanchqwar' and Andrw child of ij lib' g' the
qwilk the sad Andrw child held in his handis of the fracht of the hwlk the consall'
has ordanit that the said Andrw child sal deliuer the said ij lib' g' to the said John'
of sanchar' or til his merchand in to flandris the said John' of sanchar'
findand surte to the said Androw child til kep hym skathless' of all men that
persewis the said Andrw lachfully for the said ij lib' g'

Item terre de bogfarlach' assedatur Simoni blabre et coadiutoribus suis pro termino
quatuor annorum quolibet anno pro liij s' iiij d' plegio pro eo

The xij dai of the moneth' of August the yher' forsaid' / The Aldirman in name
of the counsaile / for the payment of a certane contribucion acht to the king
for the stancheyng of custume of salmond' and Inglis gudez / peroferrit
and laid thir' waijs to the hale gild / that is to say' / And syne eftir
divers' altercaciones it was consentit and concludit be the hale gilde
that the gude men that has the wattirez / sal yheit haue thaim in
formaling and pay the forsaid contribucion / and thair' salbe certane
men chosin to dispone apon the wattiris at vakis be thair' athes to
the maste worthi persounes that has na wattirez / And tha sammyn
men sal see quhat persounes has the wattirez that ar Ivil payaris
and dispone apon thaim to gude payaris

head.foreign: Copia obligacionis Walteri michaelis de Andwarpia

div.p:
Ic Wouter mychyels kenne ende lyde dat ic sculdic byn Jon de vas ouldermaen
van aberdyn van gherechtegher scult viij lib' g' vlems gul ghels ghels
die teghelden ende to betalen e in paerys tuschen dit ende mamysse naest
commende sonder erghenlyst / tot syne kynderen dewelke die daer now
ter tit ligghen ter scoelen In kennyssen der waereit so heb ic die voors'
Wouter mychiels dit ghescreuen met myns self hant ende gheseghelt
met myne eyghen synnet Int Jaer ons heren dusent cccc xlvj den
trensten dach goelyns
